theorem assumes wf: "wf_C_prog P" shows subject_reduction2: "P,E \<turnstile> \<langle>e,(h,l)\<rangle> \<rightarrow> \<langle>e',(h',l')\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow> (\<And>T. \<lbrakk> P,E \<turnstile> (h,l) \<surd>; P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h' \<turnstile> e' :\<^bsub>NT\<^esub> T)" and subjects_reduction2: "P,E \<turnstile> \<langle>es,(h,l)\<rangle> [\<rightarrow>] \<langle>es',(h',l')\<rangle> \<Longrightarrow> (\<And>Ts.\<lbrakk> P,E \<turnstile> (h,l) \<surd>; P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> types_conf P E h' es' Ts)"
